trans-unit.source: Describes the behavior that caused a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll"></xref> event for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> control.

The page buttons are not visible as buttons, but they occupy the space between the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls on either end of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.
The user clicks a page button when clicking the left mouse button between the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> and a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>.
The result of this action is to move the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> in the direction of the page button.
For more information about the effect of the page buttons, see the descriptions of the LargeIncrement and LargeDecrement members.
The following illustration shows the elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, including the page buttons.
![The different parts of a ScrollBar](~/add/media/scrollbarpagebutton.png "The different parts of a ScrollBar")
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> was dragged to a new position and is now no longer being dragged by the user.
To be added.

The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> moved to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum*> position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the CTRL+HOME keys are pressed.

This movement corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToTopCommand"></xref> in a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> and a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToLeftEndCommand"></xref> in a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
To be added.

The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> moved a specified distance, as determined by the value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange*>, to the left for a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> or upward for a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.

For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the page button that is above the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> is pressed, or when the PAGE UP key is pressed, and corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageUpCommand"></xref>.

For a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the page button to the left of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> is pressed, and corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageLeftCommand"></xref>.
To be added.

The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> moved a specified distance, as determined by the value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange*>, to the right for a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> or downward for a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.

For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the page button that is below the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> is pressed, or when the PAGE DOWN key is pressed, and corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageDownCommand"></xref>.

For a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the page button to the right of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> is pressed, and corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageRightCommand"></xref>.
To be added.

The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> moved to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum*> position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the CTRL+END keys are pressed.

This movement corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToEndCommand"></xref> in a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> and a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToRightEndCommand"></xref> in a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
To be added.

The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> moved a small distance, as determined by the value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange*>, to the left for a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> or upward for a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.

For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the upper <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> is pressed or when the UP ARROW key is pressed, and corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineUpCommand"></xref>.

For a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the left <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> is pressed, and corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineLeftCommand"></xref>.
To be added.

The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> moved a small distance, as determined by the value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange*>, to the right for a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> or downward for a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.

For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the lower <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> is pressed or when the DOWN ARROW key is pressed, and corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineDownCommand"></xref>.

For a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the right <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> is pressed, and corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineRightCommand"></xref>.
To be added.

The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> moved to a new position because the user selected **Scroll Here** in the shortcut menu of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
This movement corresponds to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollHereCommand"></xref>.
To view the shortcut menu, right-click the mouse when the pointer is over the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
To be added.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> was dragged and caused a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"></xref> event.

A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll"></xref> event of this ScrollEventType may occur more than one time when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> is dragged in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
To be added.
